name: 7 Wonders of The World - gems match
name_original: 7 Wonders of The World - gems match
description: Remove all the colored backgrounds by matching 3 or more of the same colored jewels. You can match jewels by clicking a group, switching 2 items, or connecting a group. After removing all the backgrounds you must move the key to the hole. You can also rotate the playing field as well!
